full_summary:
<section markdown="1">
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Phase Two - Soil Treatment Facilities Operation & Decommissioning (5 Sites)

### Reference Number
WS4170132187-Doc4245382149

### Amendment Number
3

### Solicitation Number
WS4170132187

### Publication Date
2023-10-05

### Tender Closing Date
2023-10-27T14:00:00

### Tender Status
Expired

---

### Description

This is an invitation to bid for the Phase 2 operation and decommissioning of Soil Treatment Facilities at 5 different sites. This solicitation follows an invitation to qualify, and only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

### Procurement Details

* **Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia, Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entities**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contract and Timeline

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-10-27
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-02-29

### Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries, please contact:
| Name | Email | Phone | Fax |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Brandie Klyne (SPAC/PSPC) | brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca | None | None |

### Note

Please find the specific details of this tender in the UNSPSC codes listed below:

* Environmental Services (77000000)
* Environmental Rehabilitation (77111600)
